TopicTitle: My Take on The X-2 Rocket Propelled Aircraft!!

Articles.Content: Hey guys, I was looking on youtube for something like this but when I didn't find it I just decided to make it! Let me know what you think, and if you have any observations to make it better, please share them!
Nicely filmed! could have been released much higher though.
Thanks a lot! I realized shortly after filming and editing that the real one was released at 38,000m haha.
